thread.section_title: Brake Performance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brake Performance | brakeperformance.com
thread.title: Joe H.
thread.title_full: Brake Performance reviewed by Joe H.

author: Joe H.
title: Joe H.
text: I was honestly surprised at how inexpensive the cross drilled and slotted rotors were at BrakePerformance.com. I purchased the kit for front rotors and premium brake pads, they installed just as they should and went flawlessly. BrakePerformance.com has the Norton Shopping guarantee, never heard of it and didn't think much of it... until I saw they had a lower sales price on the brakes I just bought. I contacted BrakePerformance.com to be reimbursed the difference, but was referred to Norton. It was a bit of a hassle to be reimbursed, but it happened sooner than later. I will definitely use this company in the future.
